articles.author: Matthew Dalton, Georgi Kantchev
articles.title: Manufacturers Brace for Nord Stream Repairs, Fearing Pipeline Won’t Reopen - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Russia is closing the natural-gas link this week for maintenance, and European governments worry the shutdown will be permanent
articles.content: PARISEuropean manufacturers are preparing for possible natural-gas rationing that would force them to shut production amid fears that Russia is about to cut off gas deliveries via its main artery to … [+347 chars]
